titleStmt.title: James P. Robinson to James F. Robinson
CWG11982

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 37th - 76th Regiments Enrolled Militia Primary Source Documents (1861-1866)
msIdentifier.idno: Box 80, Folder 862-865 HARRISON COUNTY Recruiting & Raising Company 54th Rgt. Ky. Militia

body.p: Sir I understand that they is an order from the war Dept to raise a company of legions in each County in Kentucky I wish to raise a company for this County which is Harrison County you will please Send me the Information about Raising a company also the price that the Soldiers get per month and term of enlistment

yours with Respect
James P. Robinson
Late Capt 55th Ky
Inft

Boyds Station
Harrison County
Dec. 5, 1865
Boyd, Capt.
Robinson, Capt. Jas. P.
To Gov.
Desires to raise a Co. of National Legion; wants information as to raising Co. and what will be the pay and term of enlistment.
Ans. Dec. 11/65, Let. Bk. p.322.
Rec. I. G. O. Dec. 11, 1865
